QuestData.Title: Nahom Must Hold
QuestData.Description: As soon as we make our move west in order to attack Neferset City, the enemy will strike us from the east, where we'll be weak.$B$BNahom will be the first to fall, and if it does, Ramkahen will soon follow.$B$BA small detachment is there already.$B$BGet a briefing from them. I want you to make sure that they hold Nahom until I can send more troops there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to the regiment at Nahom in Uldum.
QuestData.RewardText: $n! It's you! My regiment was ambushed on our way here.$B$BOur captain was slain, leaving me in command... until you got here, that is... sir!
